DOC.brief_summary: Pilot study of a new nicotine replacement therapy for smoking cessation.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study of a New Nicotine Replacement Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: This will be a pilot study of a new nicotine replacement therapy with two different directions for use in smoking cessation.
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older male and female cigarette smokers motivated and willing to stop smoking female participants of childbearing potential should use a medically acceptable means of birth control evidence of a personally signed and dated informed consent document indicating that the subject has been informed of all pertinent aspects of the study and consents to participate unstable angina pectoris or myocardial infarction during the previous 3 months pregnancy, lactation or intended pregnancy (nonpregnancy will be verified by urine pregnancy test for female participants of childbearing potential) participation in other clinical trials within the previous three months and during study participation
